item.description:
It's official. The Young Professionals Network is alive and waiting to party it up at their YPN Launch '09. Join us at the Red Sky Restaurant and Lounge (16-18 North Street, Boston) on January 29 from 7:00 to 9:00 pm. Food, drinks, networking--what more could you ask for? Head over after work and snag a drink ticket, available on a first-come, first-served basis. RSVP to rsvp@architects.org or 617-951-1433 x221 by January 22.

*Please note that you MUST RSVP to rsvp@architects.org, not just to the Meetup site. Thanks!*
item.name: YPN Launch '09
